/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with lush green trees, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on either side. A few cars can be seen navigating their way down the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The perspective of the image, taken from a high angle, offers a comprehensive view of the street and its surroundings, providing a glimpse into the daily life in this part of Beijing.
